availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Ribelin Hedges (Rowan County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Rowan County, Kentucky, farmer. Montgomery County, Kentucky native. Son of Levi Hedges and Rosannah Ribelin Hedges. Married to Malinda Russell Cassity Hedges in Rowan County, Kentucky on December 2, 1822. Father of Mary Ann Hedges Crouch, Addison Wesley Hedges, Viana Jane Hedges, Peter Thompson Hedges, Levi Marion Hedges, Rosannah Sarah Hedges Gilkison, Melissa Lucinda Hedges Generee, William Ribelin Hedges Jr., James Alva Hedges, and Isaac Armstrong Hedges. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850. Employed William N. Cassity as a laborer in Fleming County in 1850. Farmer in Rowan County in 1860. Imprisoned on a charge of arson in Fleming County in 1862.
